subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Used since {{w|Northern and Southern dynasties}}. To avoid using the character {{lang|zh|佛}}, {{zh-l|某|someone}} is used instead; the character is {{Han compound|亻|厶|ls=ic|nocap=1}}, where {{lang|zh|厶}} is a variant form of {{lang|zh|某}}.
